title: Elegant Wedding Moments
desc: Capture your special day with our Elegant Wedding Moments package. Our professional photographers will artfully document your wedding, preserving the joy, love, and emotions of the day. Includes full coverage of the ceremony and reception, beautifully edited digital images, and a complimentary engagement photoshoot.
included_services: Full coverage of the ceremony and reception
Online gallery for easy sharing and downloading
Professional prints and albums available upon request

title: Enchanting Moments
desc: Experience the enchantment of your wedding day with our Enchanting Moments package. Our skilled photographers will capture the magic and create a timeless collection of photographs that encapsulate the beauty and emotion of your special day. Includes coverage of the ceremony, reception, and bridal portraits.
included_services: Coverage of the ceremony, reception, and bridal portraits
Private online gallery for viewing and sharing

title: Dreamy Destination Weddings
desc: Make your destination wedding an unforgettable experience with our Dreamy Destination Weddings package. Our talented photographers will accompany you to your dream location and capture breathtaking moments against stunning backdrops. Includes full-day coverage, travel expenses, and a personalized online gallery.
included_services: Full-day coverage of your destination wedding
Private online gallery for sharing and downloading
